Data.Name: He Has His Quartz
Data.Name_ja: 調達依頼：吟遊詩人に贈るサークレット
Text: Master Gegeruju's open-handedness is as genuine as it is legendary. Last night, he chanced to hear an improvisatore compose on the theme of “lens of time,” and not only does he secure her a worthy theatrical agent, he wishes to give her a silver circlet set with goshenite of the first water.

Data.Name: Dreams of War, Dreams of Liars, Dreams of Dragon Fire
Data.Name_en: Dreams of War, Dreams of Liars, Dreams of Dragon Fire
Text: There has been some increased interest among the Temple Knights concerning the Twelve's legendary weapons which struck at Nidhogg. While the stories speak of the weapons forged with sand from the slumbering eyes of Halone, that the arms existed cannot be denied, and real arms are smelt with real sand. If a miner could extract some from the outcrops in the Sea of Clouds, surely there would be knights who would pay handsomely for samples with which to create replicas in homage to the ancient heroes.

Data.Name: Zurvan Card
Text: A legendary (★★★★★) card used in the game Triple Triad.

Data.Name: Susano Miniature
Text:
A statuette depicting the Lord of the Revel, Susano. (Legendary blade Ame-no-Murakumo included. Second “O” missing, and nowhere to be found.)



※One per estate only.

Data.Name: Stygian Ash
Text: The charred remnants of a malevolent spirit known to possess the bodies of the dead. Detested by the legendary beast Ixion. Duration: 30s

Data.Name: Little Dragonfish
Text: The elongated forehead of this saltwater species is compared to the nose of a tengu─a legendary dog-like creature of Far Eastern legend.

Text: A gilded horn that, when blown, summons a purebred Abalathian hoarhound mount named after its pack's legendary leader.

Data.Name: Tiger's Eye
Text: A golden-brown jewel consisting of many colored layers. When polished, it resembles the eye of a tiger─a legendary beast believed to be the ancestor of the coeurl.

Data.Name: Tome of Ichthyological Folklore - Coerthas

Text: Tales gathered from local Dravanian fishers regarding the location of legendary fish.

Data.Name: Cloudfish
Text: A semi-transparent freshwater fish native to the lakes of legendary Voor Sian Siran.

Data.Name: Lavalord
Text: A legendary lava-dwelling fish covered in thick armor and rumored to be the guardian of the gate of the Fire Hell.

Data.Name: Nepto Dragon
Text: Believed by Eorzean fisherfolk to be the spawn of Thalaos─legendary creator of seas. It is, however, more likely to be no more than an overgrown little Thalaos.

Data.Name: Kuno the Killer
Text: A legendary white catfish rarely seen by even the eldest of fisherfolk.

Data.Name: Helicoprion
Text: A legendary denizen of the sands, the helicoprion's maw is lined with long curved teeth that help it latch onto its airborne prey.

Data.Name: Shonisaurus
Text: Within this legendary scalekin's body can be found a massive secondary bladder containing lighter-than-air gas.

Data.Name: Namitaro
Text: This legendary freshwater fish cares not for those kings or queens who encroach upon his territory, and will turn to regicide to keep his waters his own.

Data.Name: Potted Oliphant's Ear
Text: A broad-leafed perennial common on south seas islands such as the Cieldalaes. The shape of the leaf is said to resemble the ear of a legendary beast twice as tall as a Roegadyn and ten times as heavy.

Data.Name: Book of Skylight
Text: A sacred tome depicting the valorous deeds of the Zodiac Braves, legendary heroes from a bygone era. This volume provides detailed descriptions of the mythical arms the men and women wielded.

Data.Name: Scattered Documents
Data.Name_ja: スキャッタードドキュメント
Text: This pile of parchment appears to be pages taken from The Last Paean─a detailed account of the life and times of a legendary bard who traveled the realm bringing joy to all he met. Strewn across one's bureau, the documents give any library or study a heightened air of sophistication.

Data.Name: Shogunyan
Text:
This legendary warrior's armor smells faintly of tuna.



Use item to acquire Shogunyan.

Data.Name: Dark Lanner Whistle
Data.Name_ja: ダークラナーホイッスル
Text: This whistle emits a shrill tone that is said to summon a legendary falcon of rage.

Data.Name: Nightmare Whistle
Data.Name_ja: ナイトメアホイッスル
Text: This whistle emits a shrill tone that is said to summon a legendary nightmare.

Data.Name: Starlight Barding
Data.Name_fr: Barde de la fête des étoiles
Data.Name_ja: スターライト・バード
Text: A suit of chocobo armor as worn by those legendary birds said to carry gifts from the stars.

Data.Name: Barding of Light
Data.Name_ja: バード・オブ・ライト
Text: A suit of chocobo armor designed to resemble a legendary Warrior of the Light.

Data.Name: Twitchbeard
Text: An extremely rare cephalopod rumored to have ties to the legendary pirate king Mistbeard.

Data.Name: Model Star Globe
Text: A spherical map of the heavens based off of legendary Ishgardian astrologian Adaunel the Younger's lifetime of findings.

Data.Name: Hraesvelgr Card
Data.Name_ja: カード:フレースヴェルグ
Text: A legendary (★★★★★) card used in the game Triple Triad.

Data.Name: Firecrest Trophy
Data.Name_ja: ファイアクレスト・トロフィー
Text:
A stunning trophy crafted from an item believed to contain the soul of a legendary dragon.



※One per estate only.

Data.Name: Syldra Horn
Text: A tar-stained horn that, when blown, emits a low, rumbling tone that can be heard even hundreds of yalms under the sea─the preferred breeding grounds of the legendary Syldra.

Data.Name: Firecrest
Text: An ancient artifact believed to contain the soul of a legendary dragon.

Data.Name: Sophic Lanner Whistle
Data.Name_ja: ゴッデスラナーホイッスル
Text: This whistle emits a shrill tone that is said to summon a legendary falcon bred to serve the ancient Meracydian goddess, Sophia.

Data.Name: Sophia Card
Text: A legendary (★★★★★) card used in the game Triple Triad.

Data.Name: Demonic Lanner Whistle
Data.Name_ja: デモンラナーホイッスル
Text: This whistle emits a shrill tone that is said to summon a legendary falcon bred to serve the ancient Meracydian god, Zurvan.

Data.Name: Legendary Clan Mark Log
Data.Name_fr: Journal de membre ardent du clan
Text: A list of elite marks slain by the log's owner─a hunter so great, that her legendary exploits are almost too remarkable to believe.

Data.Name: Centurio Tiger Horn
Data.Name_ja: セントリオタイガーホルン
Text: The horn of a beast felled on a legendary Hunt used to summon a legendary tiger gifted to you by the Clan Centurio.

Data.Name: Ixion Clarion
Text: It is said the legendary Ixion can be tamed by no man. With this horn, however, can the steed be calmed enough for one to mount his back.
